entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 06:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog becoming fog patches late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
